divs: Sighting DetailsOn September 1, 2010, I arrived home after work around 6pm. I went to the backyard and noticed a flock of small yellowish birds on the tree. There must have been about 75 ��� 100 of them. I had never seen these birds much less a flock of them hanging out on our tree. I was amazed and amused at the same time. I was thinking how beautiful they were when suddenly I noticed this white cylinder object just moving ever so smoothly and softly above the treetop. It was gently moving horizontally towards the south. It was a cloudless, sky blue, sunny day and this object was quite visible. I noticed no noise, no trail of smoke behind it. It had no lights at all; it had a perfect square in the center like a window but with no glass. I was astounded by the sight and could not believe what I was seeing. I could not move at all. I was mesmerized by this object. I did not video even though my video cam and camera was within 15 feet of my presence. My daughter was about 25 feet away from me and I did not even call her to come and witness what I was seeing. No thought of anything came into mind about videoing, calling someone, nothing of that sort. I was just in awe following the white, cylinder object until I could see it no more. If you go to youtube.com and type in white cylinder ufo, you can see what I���m talking about. The video with the electrical lines going across on the video shows a better description of what I saw. This is not my video but shared by someone else on youtube. I���m merely just showing that I saw an object very similar to that one. This way you have an idea or know what I���m talking about at least.

This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Cylinder white object with center square slightly popped out; it flew so soft and smoothly.
